tree.title: Management Prescriptions for the Coast Range
tree.description: Select which activities you want to include in your forest management prescriptions.

branch.content: Would you like to include pre-commercial thinning in your 50-year rotation?
Choose your retention level at final harvest
branch.fork: Retention suitable for riparian zones (20 trees per acre)

branch.content: Choose your retention level at final harvest
branch.fork: Retention suitable for riparian zones (20 trees per acre)

branch.content: Would you like to include pre-commercial or commercial thinning in your 80-year rotation?
Choose your retention level at final harvest
branch.fork: Retention suitable for riparian zones (20 trees per acre)

branch.content: Choose your retention level at final harvest
branch.fork: Retention suitable for riparian zones (20 trees per acre)

branch.content: Choose your retention level at final harvest
branch.fork: Retention suitable for riparian zones (20 trees per acre)

branch.content: What thinning approach would you like to apply?
branch.fork: Thin from below (remove smaller diameter trees first)
Complex uneven-aged forest structure (reverse-J shape diameter distribution)

branch.content: How frequently would you like to perform thinning?
